PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2000-14542000-09-130,  ,  IA&ND,  , 
PrecisOrder (a) consenting to the use by the Province of BRITISH COLUMBIA of its statutory power to expropriate some 10.83 hectares of land on STELLAQUO INDIAN RESERVE No. 1, for highways and public utility purposes, and (b) in lieu thereof, authorizing the transfer to the Province of administration and control over those lands for so long as required for those purposes.
Attachments
